Obtain any Raw Mega Stone or Mega Stone Ore
This is where the fun begins
book.megamons_guide.categories.getting_s: Megamons is a mod that adds a new way to evolve your Pokémon. This guide will help you get started with the mod and show you how to access the new content.
book.megamons_guide.categories.mega_evol: $(l:megamons:mega_evolution/mega_evolution)Mega Evolution$(/l) is a special type of evolution that allows Pokémon to reach a new level of power.
book.megamons_guide.categories.mega_ston: $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stones$(/l) are special items that allow certain Pokémon to Mega Evolve.$(br2)First however, a Raw $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) must be obtained from a $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_ore)Mega Stone Ore$(/l), found within the new $(l:megamons:getting_started/locate_geode)Anistarite Geodes$(/l).
book.megamons_guide.categories.support.d: Need help with the mod? Here are some ways to get support.$(br2)$(l:https://discord.gg/BDDf3dT2Mj)Discord$(/l)$(br)$(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/ascension-megamons)Modrinth$(/l)$(br)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/ascension-megamons)CurseForge$(/l)
book.megamons_guide.entries.key_stone.cr: The $(l:megamons:getting_started/key_stone)Key Stone$(/l) recipe is found under the $(l)MISC$() tab in the crafting table.
book.megamons_guide.entries.key_stone.te: The $(l:megamons:getting_started/key_stone)Key Stone$(/l) is a crucial item for Mega Evolution, as it is required to obtain a $(l:megamons:getting_started/mega_cuff)Mega Cuff$(/l) $(o)(and future mega equipment)$().
book.megamons_guide.entries.locate_geode: $(l:megamons:getting_started/locate_geode)Anistarite Geodes$(/l) are found in the Overworld and contain valuable resources.

To begin your journey with Cobblemon Megamons, you'll need to locate an $(l:megamons:getting_started/locate_geode)Anistarite Geode$(/l). These geodes are found in the Overworld (similar to Amethyst Geodes) and contain valuable resources, including:$(li)Evolution Stone Ore$(li)Mega Stone Ore$(li)Anistarite Blocks.

Once you've found an $(l:megamons:getting_started/locate_geode)Anistarite Geode$(/l), you can mine it to obtain Anistarite using an Iron Pickaxe or better. Anistarite is required for crafting a $(l:megamons:getting_started/key_stone)Key Stone$(/l).
book.megamons_guide.entries.mega_cuff.cr: The $(l:megamons:getting_started/mega_cuff)Mega Cuff$(/l) recipe is found under the $(l)EQUIPMENT$() tab in the crafting table.
book.megamons_guide.entries.mega_cuff.te: The $(l:megamons:getting_started/mega_cuff)Mega Cuff$(/l) is an item that allows you to Mega Evolve your Pokémon. To craft a $(l:megamons:getting_started/mega_cuff)Mega Cuff$(/l), you will need a $(l:megamons:getting_started/key_stone)Key Stone$(/l). $(br2)The $(l:megamons:getting_started/mega_cuff)Mega Cuff$(/l) appears on the players arm when held, and can be viewed in third person or by other players
book.megamons_guide.entries.mega_evoluti: $(l:megamons:mega_evolution/mega_evolution)Mega Evolution$(/l) is a temporary transformation that certain Pokémon can undergo.

$(l:megamons:mega_evolution/mega_evolution)Mega Evolution$(/l) is a special type of evolution that allows Pokémon to unlock new abilites, improve base stats and sometimes even change types!.$(br2)To Mega Evolve a Pokémon, you will need to use a $(l:megamons:getting_started/mega_cuff)Mega Cuff$(/l) on the Pokémon whilst it is holding the appropriate Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l).$(br2)The $(l:megamons:mega_evolution/mega_evolution)Mega Evolution$(/l) will last until the Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) is removed from the Pokémon or the $(l:megamons:getting_started/mega_cuff)Mega Cuff$(/l) is used on them again.
book.megamons_guide.entries.mega_ore.pag: $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_ore)Mega Stone Ores$(/l) are found in $(l:megamons:getting_started/locate_geode)Anistarite Geodes$(/l).
book.megamons_guide.entries.mega_ore.tex: $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_ore)Mega Stone Ores$(/l) are found in $(l:megamons:getting_started/locate_geode)Anistarite Geodes$(/l) and can be mined to obtain $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Raw Mega Stones$(/l). They require a Diamond Pickaxe or greater to mine
book.megamons_guide.entries.mega_pokemon: Each Gen 1 Mega Pokémon has a unique Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) that allows them to $(l:megamons:mega_evolution/mega_evolution)Mega Evolve$(/l).$(br2)The Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) for each Pokémon is shown in the pages that follow. These pages will be revealed when the relevant Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) is obtained for the first time.

Each Gen 2 Mega Pokémon has a unique Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) that allows them to $(l:megamons:mega_evolution/mega_evolution)Mega Evolve$(/l).$(br2)The Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) for each Pokémon is shown in the pages that follow. These pages will be revealed when the relevant Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) is obtained for the first time.

Each Gen 3 Mega Pokémon has a unique Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) that allows them to $(l:megamons:mega_evolution/mega_evolution)Mega Evolve$(/l).$(br2)The Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) for each Pokémon is shown in the pages that follow. These pages will be revealed when the relevant Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) is obtained for the first time.

Each Gen 4 Mega Pokémon has a unique Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) that allows them to $(l:megamons:mega_evolution/mega_evolution)Mega Evolve$(/l).$(br2)The Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) for each Pokémon is shown in the pages that follow. These pages will be revealed when the relevant Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stone$(/l) is obtained for the first time.
Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stones$(/l) are crafted from Raw $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stones$(/l) using a Stonecutter.

Raw $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stones$(/l) are obtained from $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_ore)Mega Stone Ore$(/l) found in $(l:megamons:getting_started/locate_geode)Anistarite Geodes$(/l).$(br2)Cut stones can be obtained from these Raw stones as shown on the next page.$(br2)These Cut $(l:megamons:mega_stones/mega_stones)Mega Stones$(/l) are crucial to $(l:megamons:mega_evolution/mega_evolution)Mega Evolve$(/l) Pokémon.
book.megamons_guide.entries.overview.tex: Welcome to Cobblemon Megamons, a Minecraft mod that brings the exciting world of Mega Evolution to your gameplay experience! In this mod, you'll embark on a journey to obtain powerful Mega Stones and unlock the true potential of your Pokémon through Mega Evolution.

Explore the vast world of Minecraft with new opportunities and challenges as you discover Mega Stones, encounter Mega Pokémon, and delve into geodes filled with valuable resources.$(br2)Whether you're a seasoned Pokémon trainer or new to the adventure, Cobblemon Megamons offers a thrilling experience that will enhance your Cobblemon playthrough
message.megacuffitem.maxmegas: You already have the maximum number of Mega Pokémon allowed.
message.megadevolveevent.stoneremoved: %d transformed into regular Form - Mega Stone Removed!
patchouli_books.megamons_guide.landing_t: Welcome to the Megamons Guide! Here you will find information on all the new items, blocks, and features added by the Megamons mod.
patchouli_books.megamons_guide.name: Megamons Guide
patchouli_books.megamons_guide.subtitle: All things Megamons!
